name: Ch15BBaseConvo4
_source: speak;Seth;Garcia, enemy forces approaching from both sides.|The trap has been sprung, just as we feared.
speak;Garcia;Aye, I see them.|Sand's making it hard to count their numbers, but there's plenty of them.
speak;Garcia;Heh, reminds me of the fight at the Caer Peyln.|Remember that, Seth?|Outnumbered three to one, and we still sent those monsters running!
speak;Seth;I remember.|Though I recall you nearly getting an claw to the shoulder because you charged ahead too eagerly.
speak;Garcia;Ha! And I recall you lecturing our troops on proper military formation before cutting the monsters down down!|Even in battle, the Silver Knight stays proper!
speak;Seth;Old habits from training the recruits, I suppose.|But today's enemies won't be so easily defeated as those monsters.
speak;Seth;These desert sands give them the advantage.|They've likely been preparing this ambush for days.
speak;Garcia;Numbers and terrain don't win battles, Seth.|Skill and heart do.|And we've got plenty of both!
speak;Seth;Sound wisdom from a veteran warrior.|How do you propose we approach this?
speak;Garcia;I say we take the fight to them!|They expect us to defend, to be cautious.|Let's show them what happens when they corner two of Renais' finest!
speak;Seth;A direct assault...|Against conventional wisdom, but you may be right.|A bold charge might disrupt their formation enough for our forces to regroup.
speak;Garcia;That's the spirit!|My axe is sharp and my arm is strong!|How about you, Silver Knight? Still have some fight left in those bones?
speak;Seth;More than enough to keep pace with you, friend.
speak;Garcia;Ha!|Then it's settled!|Like the heroes in my son's stories, eh?|Two warriors against an army!
speak;Seth;Brothers in arms...|Just like in stories.
speak;Seth;If we fall today, Garcia...|It has been an honor serving alongside you.
speak;Garcia;Save the eulogies for another day, Seth!|We're not dying here.|We're winning here!
speak;Garcia;Ready your lance, Silver Knight!|Let's show these desert rats what happens when they challenge the warriors of Renais!
speak;Seth;Right beside you, Garcia!|For Renais and our comrades!
